title: Blueberry and cranberry granola
ingredients: ['225 g (8 oz) rolled oats', '45 g (1½ oz) wheatgerm', '55 g (2 oz) millet flakes', '1 tbsp sesame seeds', '2 tbsp sunflower seeds', '2 tbsp slivered almonds', '50 g (1¾ oz) dried blueberries', '50 g (1¾ oz) dried cranberries', '15 g (½ oz) soft brown or demerara sugar', '2 tbsp maple syrup', '2 tbsp sunflower oil', '2 tbsp orange juice']
